OOC: YES THE DREAM OF THE ORACLE COMPUTER LIVES ON (LN would just act 
snoddy if I called it Vector Sigma since he said there was something 
called Vector Sigma on G1 whatever the heck that was)!  By the way 
something just occured to me.  We'll need to know this for Cybertron. 
I've always assumed bots were born about 18 do you think that's 
correct?  And do they have real parents?  Where do the sparks come 
from?  Do the bodies and sparks come together?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> ooC: Heh, sounds good. =)
> 
> -- Firedrill --
>

> renewal chamber, and lies down. "Ok, press the button."
> 
>

> > Tankor: You see that coffin-like bed over there? That's a renewal

> feeling
